selectListPiiActivityLogInquiryDAO: SELECT TOP 100 ID,APPLICATION_NAME ,FUNCTION_CODE ,format(TRANSACTION_DATE,'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm:ss') AS TRANSACTION_DATE_FORMAT,SOURCE_USERNAME ,SOURCE_ADDRESS ,SEARCH_CRITERIA ,CHANGE_TO ,CHANGE_FROM ,'' RECORD_KEY_VALUE,RESULT_STATUS ,MESSAGE FROM SCB_ACTIVITY_LOG  WHERE UPDATE_PII_LOG_DATE is null AND UPDATE_PII_LOG_STATUS is null AND PII_LOG='true' AND TRANSACTION_DATE between ? AND ?
updateStatusPiiActivityLogInquiryDAO: UPDATE SCB_ACTIVITY_LOG SET UPDATE_PII_LOG_DATE=?, UPDATE_PII_LOG_STATUS=? WHERE ID=?
